item.title: MySQL 5.7 yum安装教程
item.description: 准备工作 我们要先下载mysql的repo源。 wget https://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql57-community-release-el6-11.noarch.rpm 安装repo源： 1 2 3 4 rpm -ivh mysql57-community-release-el6-11.noarch.rpm warning: mysql57-community-release-el6-11.noarch.rpm: Header V3 DSA/SHA1 Signature, key ID 5072e1f5: NOKEY Preparing... ########################################### [100%] 1:mysql57-community-relea########################################### [100%] 或者直接安装： rpm -ivh https://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql57-community-release-el6-11.noarch.rpm 检测系统是否
